RumorFact.Text: A group of Nomai late for the test of the Deep Storm Station hurried back to the Sun Station to find a projection stone to the Deep Storm Station.
A Nomai named Pye left a projection stone to the Deep Storm Station somewhere on the Sun Station's catwalk.

ExploreFact.Text: The Deep Storm Station used the electric core of Giant's Deep to power a 6-second negative time interval that would test the mechanics of the Ash Twin Project.
Though the Deep Storm Station was unable to locate the Eye within this negative time interval, it gave the Nomai confidence to use the Sun Station without fear.
